metadata.title: CVE-2018-20822 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: LibSass 3.5.4 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (uncontrolled recursion in Sass::Complex_Selector::perform in ast.hpp and Sass::Inspect::operator in inspect.cpp).

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
